00032 
00037     class GLSLLinkProgram
00038     {
00039     private:
00041         struct UniformReference
00042         {
00043             String mName;
00044             GLenum mType;
00045             GLint  mLocation;
00046             bool isReal;
00047             GLsizei mElementCount;
00048             GLint mArraySize;
00049         };
00050 
00051         typedef std::vector<UniformReference> UniformReferenceList;
00052         typedef UniformReferenceList::iterator UniformReferenceIterator;
00054         UniformReferenceList mUniformReferences;
00055 
00057         bool        mUniformRefsBuilt;
00059         GLhandleARB mGLHandle;
00061         GLint       mLinked;
00063         bool mSkeletalAnimation;
00064 
00066         void buildUniformReferences(void);
00067 
00068     public:

00071         ~GLSLLinkProgram(void);
00072 
00076         void activate(void);
00080         void updateUniforms(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params);
00084         void updatePassIterationUniforms(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params);

00093         void setSkeletalAnimationIncluded(bool included) 
00094         { mSkeletalAnimation = included; }
00095
